QuestData.Title: Tears of Pandaria
QuestData.Description: All of this started with our ponds. In a single day, all of the water retreated down into the earth. When there was no more water in the ponds, it began to fall from the sky.$B$BDespite endless torrents of rain, the ponds do not fill. It's as if the land itself thirsts and cannot be quenched.$B$BNow the ponds birth horrific manifestations of despair. Elementals made of water from the sky and salt from the earth; the tears of Pandaria.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Weeping Horrors in Zhu Province.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't know why this is happening, but I can say for certain that those elementals were the start of it all.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c.$B$BIt's time we take back our land from this curse.
